sections.body:
Before Combat The sorcerer casts false life, stoneskin, and spell turning.

During Combat The sorcerer casts prismatic wall between himself and his enemies on the first round of combat, then casts displacement and globe of invulnerability. He attacks with area damage spells such as acid fog, chain lightning, and cone of cold.

sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: The natural arcanist is a conduit for magical power, always on the brink of releasing too much energy.

sections.url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Core Class NPCs/Sorcerer/Sorcerers/Natural Arcanist/Nar Losafel

sections.body: Nar is a troubled halfling whose innate magic has always caused inadvertent destruction in his home. He was born in a quiet halfling district of a human city, but his friends and family chased him out in his teen years, fearing for their safety. Forced to live like a hermit, Nar grew bitter and angry. His odd speech patterns and personality make him difficult to read.
